com.technipun.dc.algorithm

Class WaveProcessNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.technipun.ds.Node
      • com.technipun.dc.algorithm.WaveProcessNode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElectionProcessNode

    public class WaveProcessNode
extends Node
    This class defines a WaveProcess node.

    1.0
    Author:
    Nipun Balan Thekkummal
